channel.title: Proven as cw as assassin (thx nuke for the strat)
channel.description:
Okay here's what happened I was assassin. I said I was claiming hunter when the mastermind said he was claiming cw. I said swap claims with me. So I ended up claiming cw. I murdered 3 who turned out to be a cw.
But we converted a herbalist. I claimed court wizard to king and he said swap 9-16. So when they said they weren't redirected I said that's not how it works. So I went on.
I told the herbalist to defile them to look as assassin. I said I swapped myself with him and the "assassin" died.
I was proven as "cw" and we won
Thx @NuclearBurrito for the idea lol

item.title: Proven as cw as assassin (thx nuke for the strat)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
@NuclearBurrito

I was cult leader

We exed a good king

Paladin accused me of being cult
So I jokingly accused him of being unseen

Prince jailed me but couldn’t exe me cause he exed physician

I claim that the paladin was cult

He was exed

Jailed again and he was like I didn’t get ur claim

I’m prince

I accuse the scorned next

Exed

Then I accused the reaper

Lol

Read full topic
item.source: Proven as cw as assassin (thx nuke for the strat)
